text: Suzuki Motorcycle India, Private Limited (SMI) is the wholly owned Indian subsidiary of Suzuki, Japan. It was the third Suzuki automotive venture in India, after TVS Suzuki (1982–2001) and Maruti Suzuki (1982). In 1982, the joint-venture between Suzuki Motor Corporation and TVS Motor Company incorporated and started production of two wheelers in India. In 2001, after separating ways with TVS motor company, the company was re-entered as Suzuki Motorcycle India, Private Limited (SMI), in 2006. The company has set up a manufacturing facility at Gurgaon, Haryana with an annual capacity of 5,40,000 units. == Vehicles == ===Motorcycles=== * Gixxer * Gixxer SF * Gixxer SF FI * Gixxer SF FI ABS * Gixxer SF SP * Gixxer SP * Intruder 155 * Intruder 155 ABS * Gixxer SF 250 Road king * Gixxer 250 ===Scooters=== * Access 125 * Access 125 SE * Burgman Street ===Sports bikes=== * GSX-S1000 ABS * GSX-S1000F ABS * GSX-R1000 ABS * GSX-R1000R ABS *Hayabusa GSX 1300R *Intruder M1800R * Intruder M1800R BOSS Edition * V-Strom-1000 ABS ===ATVs=== * Ozark 250 * Quadsport Z400 ==Discontinued== ===Scooters=== * Suzuki Swish * Suzuki let's ===Motorcycles/sports bikes=== *Suzuki GS150R *Suzuki Hayate 110 *Suzuki Heat 125 *Suzuki Inazuma 250 *Suzuki Slingshot 125 *Suzuki Slingshot Plus 125 *Suzuki Zeus 125 ==References== Category:Suzuki Category:Indian subsidiaries of foreign companies Category:Manufacturing companies of India Category:Motorcycle manufacturers of India
title: Suzuki Motorcycle India Limited
